sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the element : .

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element content is used to specify the content of the file being created when processing a textdump operation.

note.para: Of course, it is possible to use XML entity references in the #PCDATA or string of this element.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.screen: echo Generating file group cd /etc cat > group << 'EOF' root:x:0: bin:x:1: sys:x:2: kmem:x:3: tty:x:4: tape:x:5: daemon:x:6: floppy:x:7: disk:x:8: lp:x:9: dialout:x:10: audio:x:11: EOF
